message: If you're facing these symptoms, maybe you're facing with COVID-19. I've an Ayurvedic remedy for it.

Medication & Habits to follow to recover: Chew Tulsi leaves daily for immunity.
Mix turmeric and honey, and consume it.
Follow prescribed medical treatment.

precautions: Wear a mask and maintain social distance
last_message: If you aren't diagnosed within 3 days, visit the nearest doctor.

precautions: Follow a balanced diet and avoid sugary foods

precautions: Keep an inhaler handy for emergencies

message: If you're facing these symptoms, maybe you're facing with Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS). I've an Ayurvedic remedy for it.

precautions: Maintain a food diary to identify trigger foods
Consult a gastroenterologist for a personalized plan

message: If you're facing these symptoms, maybe you're facing with Heart Disease. I've an Ayurvedic remedy for it.

Medication & Habits to follow to recover: Include garlic in your daily diet.

precautions: Regularly monitor blood pressure and cholesterol

last_message: Regular exercise is crucial for heart health.
